usernameMinLength: Username should be minimum 5 characters long
usernameMaxLength: Username should be maximum 30 characters long
usernameRegex: Username should be in lowercase and can have numbers. The only allowed special characters are '_' and '.'
passwordMinLength: Password should be minimum 8 characters long
emailPlaceholder: Enter the email of the account you wanna recover
recoveryEmail: Enter the email of the account you wanna recover
bornDateHelperText: This is to confirm your legal of age
bornDateOfLegalAge: You must be of legal age to register
biographyMaxLength: Biography should be maximum 255 characters long
title: Title
descriptionMaxLength: Description should be maximum 255 characters long
startDateTimeHelperText: The date and time at which the adventure starts
startDateTimeAfterNow: Meeting date time should be after now
endDateTimeHelperText: The date and time at which the adventure ends
endDateTimeBeforeStartDateTime: Farewell date time should be after meeting date time
numInvitationsMin: Number of invitations should be minimum 1
